n22-captcha/v-model.descriptionEn: whether to show captcha or not

n22-captcha/is-view.description: 是否内嵌在页面内展示，否则以弹层形式
n22-captcha/is-view.descriptionEn: whether to show as inline element or append to the body

n22-captcha/maxlength.description: 字符最大输入长度, 若为-1则不限制输入长度
n22-captcha/maxlength.descriptionEn: maxlength of string, set to -1 as no restriction

n22-captcha/mask.descriptionEn: whether to mask code or not

n22-captcha/system.description: 是否使用系统默认键盘
n22-captcha/system.descriptionEn: Use system keyboard or simulated keyboard

n22-captcha/auto-countdown.description: 是否自动开始倒计时，否则需手动调用countdown

n22-captcha/count.description: 倒计时时长, 设置为0的时候不显示倒计时按钮

n22-captcha/count-normal-text.description: 发送验证码正常状态文字

n22-captcha/count-active-text.description: 发送验证码及倒计时按钮文案配置项
